original_text: It shall be eaten in one house; you shall not take any of the flesh outside the house, and you shall not break any of its bones.
korean_text: 한 집에서 먹되 그 고기를 조금도 집 밖으로 내지 말고 뼈도 꺾지 말지며

sentences.original_text: It shall be eaten in one house
you shall not take any of the flesh outside the house
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 고기를 집 밖으로 가져가지 말라.

sentences.original_text: and you shall not break any of its bones
